name: Doge Space Adventure
description:
What will Commander Doge do against the villainous bad doggo group E.G.O.D. ? Turn them into good doggos of course!
'WASD' or arrow keys for movement. Spacebar for shooting Dogecoin!

This is a prototype,  so please excuse any bugs for now!

Dogecoin donations are much appreciated:

DD6E 7sWK 9hbL rh19 zFuZ eLv6 HU9X fAjf Wv

Good luck cadet!
